con:request.name: GetTrx
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v5.Common.Requests">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:GetTrx>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr2:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:BeginDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:BringLinkedHierarchy>true</acr2:BringLinkedHierarchy>\r <acr2:ColumnDelimiter xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:CustomerName xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:EndDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ExcludeResult xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ExcludeTransactionType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ExcludeVoid>false</acr2:ExcludeVoid>\r <acr2:IncludeHeader>false</acr2:IncludeHeader>\r <acr2:IncludeImage>false</acr2:IncludeImage>\r <acr2:InvoiceId xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MerchantType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:PaymentNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:PaymentType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ProcessDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:Processed xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ReferenceNumber>${GetTrx}</acr2:ReferenceNumber>\r <acr2:Result xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:RowDelimiter xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TransactionType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TransformType>XML</acr2:TransformType>\r <acr2:User xsi:nil="true"/>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:GetTrx>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: GetCardTrx
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:acr2="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v5.Common.Requests">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:GetCardTrx>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr2:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:BeginDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:BringLinkedHierarchy>true</acr2:BringLinkedHierarchy>\r <acr2:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ColumnDelimiter xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:EndDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ExcludeResult xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ExcludeTransactionType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ExcludeVoid>false</acr2:ExcludeVoid>\r <acr2:IncludeHeader>false</acr2:IncludeHeader>\r <acr2:IncludeSignature>true</acr2:IncludeSignature>\r <acr2:InvoiceId xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:MerchantType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:NameOnCard xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:PaymentType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:ReferenceNumber>${GetTrx}</acr2:ReferenceNumber>\r <acr2:Result xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:RowDelimiter xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:Settle xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:SettleDate xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TransactionType xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr2:TransformType>XML</acr2:TransformType>\r <acr2:User xsi:nil="true"/>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:GetCardTrx>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
